properties.name: outbox.poll-interval
properties.description: Interval in milliseconds at which the outbox is polled

properties.name: outbox.max-retries
properties.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed outbox events

properties.name: outbox.locking.extension-seconds
properties.description: Number of seconds to extend the lock duration

properties.name: outbox.locking.refresh-threshold
properties.description: Threshold in seconds before refreshing the lock

properties.name: outbox.schema-initialization.enabled
properties.description: Whether schema initialization is enabled at startup
